page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: TANYA. I get up every morning at 5-30 and feed the animals, rabbits,guineapigs,bantams,pheasants and fish. Then I have breakfast, help wash up and leave for school. When I get home I change and then check the sheep with Mum. Then my sister and I do odd jobs including checking the sow'sfarrowing crates.We then have tea and I watch television or read. Jane. A typical day for me would be to get up at 8-00 have breakfast whilst Mum packs my lunch.In the morning we do reading, maths and english.After breaktime lessons beging again suach as history.At 3.20 we go home. Iget changed and go out to play or watch television.
